column2: (let ((s (secure-hash 'sha1 "abc" nil nil t))) (list (string-bytes s) (aref s 0) (string-to-list (substring s 0 1))))
(let ((s (secure-hash 'sha256 "abc" nil nil t))) (list (string-bytes s) (aref s 0) (aref s 31) (string-to-list (substring s 0 1))))
(let ((s (secure-hash 'md5 "abc" nil nil t))) (list (string-bytes s) (aref s 0) (aref s 15) (string-to-list (substring s 0 1))))
